Show:

Activity Class

Extends BaseSound
Module: Models

A sound model which triggers a single or multiple sound files with multiple voices (polyphony).

Constructor

Activity

(
  • sound
  • context
  • [onLoadCallback]
  • [onProgressCallback]
)

Parameters:

  • sound String/AudioBuffer/File

    Either URL or AudioBuffer or File of sound.

  • context AudioContext

    AudioContext to be used.

  • [onLoadCallback] Function optional

    Callback when the sound has finished loading.

  • [onProgressCallback] Function optional

    Callback when the audio file is being downloaded.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

Methods

connect

(
  • destination
  • [output]
  • [input]
)

Inherited from BaseSound

If the parameter output is an AudioNode, it connects to the releaseGainNode. If the output is a BaseSound, it will connect BaseSound's releaseGainNode to the output's inputNode.

Parameters:

  • destination AudioNode

    AudioNode to connect to.

  • [output] Number optional

    Index describing which output of the AudioNode from which to connect.

  • [input] Number optional

    Index describing which input of the destination AudioNode to connect to.

disconnect

(
  • [outputIndex]
)

Inherited from BaseSound

Disconnects the Sound from the AudioNode Chain.

Parameters:

  • [outputIndex] Number optional

    Index describing which output of the AudioNode to disconnect.

listParams

(
  • [paramArray]
)

Inherited from BaseSound:

List all SPAudioParams this Sound exposes

Parameters:

  • [paramArray] Array optional

    Array of all the SPAudioParams this Sound exposes.

pause

()

Inherited from BaseSound

Pause the currently playing sound at the current position.

play

(
  • [when]
)

Inherited from BaseSound

Enable playback.

Parameters:

  • [when] Number optional

    At what time (in seconds) the sound be triggered

release

(
  • [when]
  • [fadeTime]
)

Inherited from BaseSound

Linearly ramp down the gain of the audio in time (seconds) to 0.

Parameters:

  • [when] Number optional

    Time (in seconds) at which the Envelope will release.

  • [fadeTime] Number optional

    Amount of time (seconds) it takes for linear ramp down to happen.

setSources

(
  • sound
  • [onLoadCallback]
)

Reinitializes a Activity and sets it's sources.

Parameters:

  • sound Array/AudioBuffer/String/File

    Single or Array of either URLs or AudioBuffers of sound.

  • [onLoadCallback] Function optional

    Callback when all sound have finished loading.

start

(
  • when
  • [offset]
  • [duration]
)

Inherited from BaseSound

Start playing after specific time and from a specific offset. If offset is not defined, the value of startPoint property is used.

Parameters:

  • when Number

    The delay in seconds before playing the sound

  • [offset] Number optional

    The starting position of the playhead

  • [duration] Number optional

    Duration of the portion (in seconds) to be played

stop

(
  • when
)

Inherited from BaseSound

Stops the sound and resets play head to 0.

Parameters:

  • when Number

    Time offset to stop

Properties

action

SPAudioParam

Pitch shift of the triggered voices in semitones.

Default Value: 0

Minimum Value: 0.0

Maximum Value: 1.0

audioContext

AudioContext

Inherited from BaseSound:

Web Audio API's AudioContext. If the context passed to the constructor is an AudioContext, a new one is created here.

decayTime

SPAudioParam

Default Value: 1

Minimum Value: 0.05

Maximum Value: 10.0

inputNode

Object

Inherited from BaseSound:

The input node that the output node will be connected to.
Set this value to null if no connection can be made on the input node

Default Value: null

isInitialized

Boolean

Inherited from BaseSound:

If Sound is currently initialized.

Default Value: false

isPlaying

Boolean

Inherited from BaseSound:

If Sound is currently playing.

Default Value: false

maxRate

SPAudioParam

Pitch shift of the triggered voices in semitones.

Default Value: 1

Minimum Value: 0.05

Maximum Value: 8.0

modelName

String

Inherited from BaseSound:

String name of the model.

Default Value: "Model"

numberOfInputs

Number

Inherited from BaseSound

Number of inputs

Default Value: 1

numberOfOutputs

Number

Inherited from BaseSound:

Number of outputs

Default Value: 1

releaseGainNode

GainNode final

Inherited from BaseSound:

Release Gain Node

Default Value: Internal GainNode

riseTime

SPAudioParam

Default Value: 1

Minimum Value: 0.05

Maximum Value: 10.0

sensitivity

SPAudioParam

Maximum value for random pitch shift of the triggered voices in semitones.

Default Value: 0.5

Minimum Value: 0.0

Maximum Value: 1.0

startPoint

SPAudioParam

Default Value: 0.0

Minimum Value: 0.0

Maximum Value: 0.99
